item.title: A new hosting and domain
item.description: I haven’t posted here in a long time, although I’ve been making some changes to this blog behind the scenes. One of the more recent (and more permanent) ones is switching to a different theme - this time it’s a customized version of Hyde. Another big and permanent change is switching to a custom hosting and a custom domain - from now on, this blog will be available on reusingthewheel.net.

item.title: Migrating to Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: I wanted to have greater control over my blog, so I’ve been thinking about moving it to a self-hosted WordPress installation. In the end, I decided to migrate from WordPress to a static blog generated with Hugo and hosted on GitHub Pages. This post will be the last one posted on reusingthewheel.wordpress.com - the future ones will be posted on piotr-rusin.github.io.
